profileAlternative.name: Jinshu Niu
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist @ Lyft
profileAlternative.summary:
I graduated with an M.S degree from Columbia University, Management Science and Engineering program. Prior to joining Columbia, I hold a B.S degree in Operations Research from Tsinghua University, China.

My extensive data science and analytics experience in McKinsey, AIG and Louis Vuitton provided me with rigorous exposure to multiple industries, clients and teams. I am especially interested in applying big-data analytics and customer centric approach to uncover opportunities and drive growth. I am proficient in SQL, Hive, Python, R, SAS (Certified Advanced Programmer), and Tableau.

Please feel free to contact me at jinshu.niu@columbia.edu. I look forward to sharing my professional experience and discuss future opportunities with you.

aboutAlternative.text:

My extensive data science and analytics experience in McKinsey, AIG and Louis Vuitton provided me with rigorous exposure to multiple industries, clients and teams. I am proficient in SQL, Hive, Python, R, SAS (Certified Advanced Programmer), and Tableau.

Please feel free to contact me at jinshu.niu@columbia.edu. I look forward to sharing my professional experience and discuss future opportunities with you.

educations.title: Columbia University in the City of New York

given.text: Jinshu approaches her work with a creative and analytical mindset. Even in a fairly open-ended task, she applied both creativity and rigor. She flexibly responded to shifting her focus from one project to another, and did a good job changing gears to accommodate demands from different projects. Jinshu is collaborative and a good team player, and has established good working relationships with our immediate team. She clearly loves to learn; for example, she took the initiative to learn some Python on her own. She is very results-oriented, and always delivers strong work to the team. Our team could always count on her diligence and thoughtfulness. See less

items: Data Analysis and Applied Statistics (in R)
Study on Logistics and Multi-echelon Inventory Optimization of Perishable Agricultural Products
Simulation and Optimization of Supermarket Queuing System
Outstanding Student in Social Practice and Leadership
